title: The Game
creator_credit: Colin Pym and SMS Audio Visual
brief_description: Australian Rules football is uniquely Australian. Six champion players demonstrate the basic skills and techniques of the game. Includes scenes from the 1977 grand finals in Victoria, South Australia and Western Australia. Features VFL football players Barry Cable, Russel Ebert, Bill Gallagher, Peter Knights, Graham Moss, Kevin Sheedy.
